title: Why I Fell in Love with Clean Code
excerpt: How I went from messy scripts to mindful structure — and found that writing clean code is an act of respect, not just habit.

title: The Sea
excerpt: No one told the sea it wasn’t good enough. It made its own rules — calm, wild, and untamed.

title: What My First Project Taught Me
